item.title: 英国抵押贷款持有量猛增，利率上调挤压房主
item.description: 2024 年第二季度，由于高利率对房主的挤压，英国抵押房屋的数量上升了 8%。【原文：The number of UK mortgaged homes taken into possession rose 8% in the second quarter of 2024 as high interest rates squeezed homeowners.】

item.title: 英航因空域挑战暂停北京航班
item.description: 英国航空公司将从 10 月 26 日起暂停从伦敦飞往北京的航班，这是在俄罗斯空域持续关闭和需求疲软的情况下，最新一家取消中国航线的航空公司。【原文：British Airways will suspend flights from London to Beijing starting October 26, the latest airline to pull services to China amid continued Russian airspace closure and weaker demand.】

item.title: 纳米比亚石油公司总裁洗脱欺诈指控
item.description: 一项独立调查宣布纳米比亚国家石油公司总经理无罪，他被控转移资金以购买安哥拉的一个石油区块。【原文：An independent inquiry acquitted the managing director of National Petroleum Corp. of Namibia on charges related to the transfer of funds to buy an oil block in Angola.】

item.title: 美国劳工数据和 30 年期债券拍卖前全球债券上涨
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美国劳动力市场数据和美联储政策制定者的讲话，以进一步明确货币政策的走向，全球债券上涨。【原文：Global bonds gained as investors awaited data on the US labor market and remarks from a Federal Reserve policymaker for more clarity on the path of monetary policy.】

item.title: 德国莱茵金属公司首席执行官称武器装备热潮是他所见过的最大热潮
item.description: 德国莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall AG）因俄罗斯入侵乌克兰而加强了欧洲的防务，公司业绩实现了创纪录的增长，预计未来几年每年的收入都会猛增。【原文：Rheinmetall AG is seeing record growth because of Europe’s defense ramp-up in response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, with annual jumps in revenue expected for years to come.】

item.title: 据说韦丹塔将搁置价值 25 亿美元的钢铁业务出售计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，韦丹塔公司（Vedanta Ltd.）已经搁置了出售钢铁业务的计划，此前该公司出售了 10 亿美元的股份，为其财务状况提供了更多的喘息空间，但由于环境和监管方面的担忧，潜在的竞购者却望而却步。【原文：Vedanta Ltd. has put a plan to sell its steel business on hold after a $1 billion share sale gave the company more breathing room with its finances, and as environmental and regulatory concerns deter potential bidders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 裁员成为越来越多美国公司的最后手段
item.description: 美联储能否避免经济下滑，部分取决于大流行后的不正常现象能持续多久：劳动力囤积。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s ability to avert a downturn rests in part on just how long a post-pandemic irregularity can continue: labor hoarding.】

item.title: 印度央行撇开对限制外国债券持有的担忧
item.description: 印度央行淡化了人们对其上周对有资格被纳入全球指数的债券的外国所有权所施加的一些限制的担忧。【原文：India’s central bank played down concerns over some restrictions it imposed last week on foreign ownership of bonds eligible for inclusion in a global index.】

item.title: 尼日利亚先锋私人信贷基金瞄准中型企业
item.description: 总部位于拉各斯的 FCMB 资产管理有限公司正在寻求为尼日利亚首个私人信贷基金筹集 1,000 亿奈拉（6,300 万美元）的资金，以支持西非国家的中型企业。【原文：Lagos-based FCMB Asset Management Ltd. is seeking to raise 100 billion naira ($63 million) in Nigeria’s first private credit fund to support mid-sized firms in the West African nation.】

item.title: 日本西南主要岛屿附近发生强烈地震
item.description: 日本气象厅称，日本西南主要岛屿九州的宫崎近海发生 7.1 级强烈地震，引发海啸警报。【原文：A powerful earthquake with a magnitude of 7.1 struck off the coast of Miyazaki on Japan’s main southwest island of Kyushu, prompting a tsunami warning, the Meteorological Agency said.】

item.title: 高盛首席信息官谈银行如何真正使用人工智能
item.description:
新技术对高盛银行家、工程师等人意味着什么？【原文：

What the new tech means for Goldman bankers, engineers and more.

】

item.title: 土耳其央行维持年底通胀前景不变
item.description: 土耳其中央银行维持通胀预期不变，表明该行有信心其限制性立场将最终缓解今年下半年及以后的物价压力。【原文：Turkey’s central bank kept its inflation forecast unchanged, showing confidence that its restrictive stance will eventually soften price pressures for the rest of the year and beyond.】

item.title: Baete 称，Pimco 七月 "超级强劲"，资金流入达 110 亿欧元
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. attracted more money from outside clients in the first few weeks of the third quarter, as investors return to bonds with interest rates widely expected to fall this year.】

item.title: 掉期交易员削减对日本央行今年再次加息的押注
item.description: 在短短一周内，掉期市场的交易员们将日本央行今年再次加息的概率降低了一半。【原文：In the span of a week, traders in the swaps market have halved the odds of the Bank of Japan hiking interest rates again this year.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在经历 11 月以来最好的一天后再次回调
item.description: 欧洲股市下滑，结束了连续两天的反弹，本周的交易继续波澜不惊，财报喜忧参半。【原文：European stocks slipped, snapping a two-day rebound, as a choppy week of trading continues and amid mixed earnings reports.】

item.title: 美国股市的艰难夏季盖过了超预期的收益
item.description: 美股艰难的夏季给美国企业多年来最受好评的财报季蒙上了阴影。【原文：A tough summer for US stocks is overshadowing Corporate America’s best-received earnings season in years.】

item.title: 散户投资者连续四周买入日本股票
item.description: 上周，由于日本央行加息后日元升值以及对美国经济放缓的担忧，日本股指下跌，个人投资者抢购日本股票。【原文：Individual investors snapped up Japanese stocks last week, when the country’s indexes tumbled on rising yen following the Bank of Japan’s rate hike, and on concern over US economic slowdown.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气继续流入欧洲，欧洲天然气市场保持稳定
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格保持在今年的最高水平附近，因为交易商正在监控俄罗斯燃料穿越乌克兰的情况。【原文：European natural gas prices held near the highest levels this year as traders monitor the transit of Russian fuel across Ukraine.】

item.title: 法国警告因高温引发用水限制而削减核电
item.description: 由于炎热的天气限制了排入罗讷河的水量，法国电力公司可能将从本周末开始减少核反应堆的生产。【原文：Electricite de France SA will likely curtail production at nuclear reactors starting this weekend as hot weather restricts the amount of water that can be discharged into the Rhone River.】

item.title: 塞浦路斯银行退出伦敦，将重返希腊交易所
item.description: 塞浦路斯最大的贷款机构塞浦路斯银行控股有限公司（Bank of Cyprus Holdings Plc）表示，计划将其主要上市地从伦敦证券交易所迁回雅典证券交易所，以吸引新的投资者。【原文：Bank of Cyprus Holdings Plc plans to move its primary listing from the London Stock Exchange back to the Athens bourse in a bid to attract new investors, the country’s largest lender said.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀加速，进一步降息空间缩小
item.description: 匈牙利的通货膨胀率走高，突破了央行容忍范围的上限，缩小了央行长达一年多的货币宽松周期继续下去的空间。【原文：Hungary’s inflation rate edged higher, breaching the top end of the central bank’s tolerance band and narrowing the room for the continuation of its more than yearlong monetary-easing cycle.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统鲁托在抗议活动再起的阴影下宣誓就职内阁
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）任命了19名经议会批准的部长，尽管公民们威胁要恢复反政府抗议活动，这些抗议活动已导致数十人丧生。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto appointed 19 ministers approved by parliament even as citizens threatened to resume anti-government protests that have led to the killing of scores of people.】

item.title: 随着各市场需求的改善，Deliveroo 客户订单量上升
item.description: Deliveroo Plc 表示，上半年客户订单价值有所增长，在英国食品配送平台需求增长后，今年的盈利将高于预期。【原文：Deliveroo Plc said the value of customer orders grew in the first half and that earnings for the year will be on the higher end of its forecast after demand rose at the UK food delivery platform.】

item.title: 沙特阿美寻求与中国达成更多石油化工协议
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司希望今明两年在中国投资更多化工厂，这是该公司为确保原油长期买家而在中国达成的交易的补充。【原文：Saudi Aramco is looking to invest in more chemical plants in China this year and next, adding to deals it’s already clinched in the country to secure long-term buyers for its crude.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮减退，小米支持的人工智能芯片制造商黑芝麻香港首秀下跌
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商黑芝麻国际控股有限公司（Black Sesame International Holding Ltd.）的股票在首次上市时暴跌达 35%，对香港吸引更多科技企业上市的努力造成了打击。【原文：Shares of artificial intelligence chipmaker Black Sesame International Holding Ltd. tumbled as much as 35% on their debut, dealing a blow to Hong Kong’s efforts to lure more technology listings.】

item.title: 中国江苏停止部分村镇银行国债交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在监管机构启动市场操纵调查后，中国江苏省农村信用社联合社指示一些银行暂停国债交易。【原文：China’s Jiangsu Rural Credit Union directed some banks to suspend government bond trading after a market manipulation probe was launched by regulators, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行称银行需利用分行吸收存款以应对资金紧缩
item.description: 印度银行应依靠其庞大的分支网络，从越来越多将资金投入投资产品的人那里获得更多的家庭储蓄，这使得印度贷款机构存款增长乏力的状况进一步恶化。【原文：India’s banks should lean on their vast branch networks to get more household savings from people who are increasingly putting their money into investment products, worsening the sluggish deposit growth among the country’s lenders.】

item.title: 埃及通胀持续放缓，货币贬值仍有影响
item.description: 埃及通胀率连续第五个月放缓，降至 2022 年末以来的最低水平，尽管新一轮的补贴削减政策出台，但埃及通胀率仍可能继续放缓。【原文：Egyptian inflation slowed for a fifth month to its lowest level since late 2022, keeping up an easing streak that’s seen as likely to continue despite a new wave of subsidy cuts.】

item.title: 安联因保险业务利润增长，Pimco 资金流入
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）是债券巨头太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Allianz SE, the owner of bond giant Pacific Investment Management Co., saw second-quarter profit rise on stronger earnings from the life-health insurance and asset management businesses.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）裁决后，Uniper 增加 5.4 亿欧元准备金
item.description: 德国 Uniper SE 公司表示，在因俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）减少供应而被判赔偿损失后，该公司已预留了约 5.4 亿欧元（5.9 亿美元）的准备金。【原文：Germany’s Uniper SE said it has set aside a provision of roughly €540 million ($590 million) after it was awarded damages for curtailed supplies from Russia’s Gazprom PJSC.】
